resource: 1002689.derived=false 1002689.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002689.description=These lights turn on when the engine switch is turned to IGNITION ON mode to indicate that a system check is being performed. They will turn off after the engine is started, or after a few seconds. There may be a malfunction in the system if the lights do not come on, or do not turn off. Have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer. 1002689.vtc=true
